requests-form.monthsTooltip: Select one or more months for the data
requests-form.daysTooltip: Select one or more days for the data
requests-form.hoursTooltip: Select one or more hours for the data
requests-form.pressureLevelsTooltip: Select one or more pressure levels for your data visualization
requests-form.areaCoveredTooltip: Select the geographical areas to be covered
requests-form.mapTypesTooltip: Select the types of maps to generate

requests-form.mapLevelsTooltip: Select the vertical levels for your maps
requests-form.fileFormatTooltip: Select the output file format for your data

errors.title: Error
errors.login: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
errors.submission: Failed to submit request. Please try again.

hero.title: Fast & Efficient Data Processing
hero.subtitle: Submit requests, visualize results, and gain valuable insights from your meteorological data with our advanced processing platform.

feature1.title: Data Processing
feature1.description: Process meteorological data efficiently with our high-performance computing resources.

feature2.title: Interactive Visualization
feature2.description: Visualize your results with interactive charts and maps for better understanding.

feature3.title: Real-time Tracking
feature3.description: Track the progress of your requests in real-time and receive notifications when completed.

dataExamples.title: Explore Data Examples
dataExamples.content1: Temperature data processing allows for analysis of thermal patterns across different geographic regions and time periods. Our system handles temperature measurements from various sources and grid resolutions.
dataExamples.content2: Pressure level data provides crucial information about atmospheric conditions. Process multi-level pressure data and generate comprehensive visualization maps for meteorological analysis.
dataExamples.content3: Humidity data processing enables monitoring of water vapor content in the atmosphere. Analyze humidity patterns to better understand precipitation systems and climate conditions.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Create your first data processing request and unlock the power of advanced meteorological analysis.

about.title: About FAST-IBAN Project
about.description: A modern platform for meteorological data processing and analysis
about.projectDescription: The FAST-IBAN project is a comprehensive solution designed to process, analyze, and visualize meteorological data efficiently. It leverages high-performance computing techniques to provide researchers and meteorologists with valuable insights from complex datasets.

techStack.frontend: React with TypeScript, Redux, and Tailwind CSS for the user interface
techStack.backend: NestJS with TypeScript for the API and authentication services
techStack.processing: C and python for high-performance numerical calculations and map generation

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

form.name: Name
form.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

success.title: Message sent!
success.message: Your email client should open with a pre-filled message. Please send it to complete.
